CustomField.formula: IF( AND(CreatedDate < LastModifiedDate, LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', LastModifiedBy.Profile.Name <> 'QES Interface'), "YES", "NO")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Has this AR Aging record been manually updated in Salesforce.com since it was loaded on the Snapshot date.
CustomField.label: Manually Updated?
